p: The crude extracts and isolated daturaolone ( 1) were assessed for β-secretase inhibitory potential as per standard procedure [ 25]. 82.5 μL buffer contains 50 mM sodium acetate buffer with pH 4.5 was mixed to each inhibitor, in all wells, and after that, 2.5 μL from 20 U/100 μL solution of the enzyme (0.5 U) should be combined. The reaction mixture was incubated for 20 minutes at 25°C. Then, the reaction will be starting by combing 62.5 nM from 12500 nM/1 mL solutions of a substrate; the incubation should be again obtained for 60 minutes at 37°C in the dark condition. After incubation of a 96-well black plate, 1000 nM from 100 μM/1 mL stock solution of extract/fractions and isolated daturaolone ( 1) were combined; then, the incubation time of the plate should be read by the fluorometer machine (CHAMELEON-HIDEX) as per reported standard procedure [ 25] . Emissions, as well as excitation for Mca, are 325 and 400 nm, respectively.
